author: french.xinhuanet.com
title: L'ATMIS salue le rôle des femmes casques bleus dans la recherche de la paix - Xinhua - french.news.cn
text:
MOGADISCIO, 8 mars (Xinhua) -- La Mission de transition de l'Union africaine en Somalie (ATMIS) a salué vendredi la contribution inestimable des femmes casques bleus dans cette mission et partout dans le monde à la paix et à la sécurité.
Le représentant spécial de l'Union africaine (UA) pour la Somalie et chef de l'ATMIS, Mohamed El-Amine Souef, a reconnu l'importance de l'égalité des genres et s'est engagé à investir dans la représentation des femmes à tous les niveaux, et à l'encourager. "Je souhaite exprimer ma plus profonde admiration et mon respect pour le courage, l'engagement et la contribution importante que nos femmes casques bleus apportent pour la paix et la sécurité en Somalie", a déclaré M. Souef dans un communiqué publié à Mogadiscio, capitale de la Somalie, à l'occasion de la Journée internationale des droits des femmes.
"Leur participation dans des domaines auparavant dominés par les hommes non seulement remet en question nos normes traditionnelles en matière de genre, mais joue aussi un rôle d'inspiration pour les communautés locales, démontrant les capacités et le potentiel des femmes à contribuer à la paix et à la stabilité", a fait valoir M. Souef.
L'ATMIS salue également le rôle joué par les femmes casques bleus dans le processus de transition actuel, soulignant que leur expertise, leur compréhension et leur engagement sont des atouts inestimables pour faciliter un transfert fluide et durable des responsabilités de sécurité au gouvernement somalien.
"Continuons à défendre la cause de l'égalité des genres et à nous assurer que le potentiel de chaque femme soit reconnu, apprécié, et pleinement mis à profit dans notre quête collective de la paix et de la stabilité", a-t-il ajouté. Fin
Vous avez une question, une remarque, des suggestions ? Contactez notre équipe de rédaction par e-mail à xinhuanet_french@news.cn

author: Open.online
title: Sciopero generale Landini | Oltre mezzo milione in piazza solo nei regimi autoritari non si può
text: Sciopero generale Landini | Oltre mezzo milione in piazza solo nei regimi autoritari non si può È in corso lo Sciopero generale proclamato dai segretari di Cgil e Uil, Maurizio Landini e Pierpaolo Bombardieri. Uno stop di 8 ore per tutti i settori privati e pubblici, ad eccezione dei trasporti dove è di 4 ore: per bus e metro dalle 9 alle 13, così come per il trasporto marittimo, per i voli dalle 10 alle 14. Esclusi dallo stop i treni. «Sono almeno 500mila i cittadini» scesi in 43 piazze su tutto il territorio nazionale per protestare contro la manovra di bilancio del governo Meloni, sostiene Landini. Il segretario della Cgil alla guida di un corteo a Bologna canta e dichiara: «Noi vogliamo rivoltare come un guanto questo Paese e per farlo c’è bisogno della partecipazione di tutte le persone. La rivolta sociale, per noi, significa proprio dire che ognuno di noi non deve voltarsi da un’altra parte di fronte alle ingiustizie».Leggi su Open.online - Sciopero generale contro la manovra: adesione oltre il 70%. Cortei in 43 città - I primi dati: "Adesione media oltre il 70%" - In corso lo sciopero generale. Landini: 'In piazza in 500mila'. Landini: «In piazza in Italia oltre 500mila persone» - Oggi lo sciopero generale di 8 ore proclamato da Cgil e Uil contro la manovra. Si fermeranno i lavoratori di tutti i settori, pubblico e privato, ad eccezione delle ferrovie. Salvo ... (ilgazzettino.it) - Sciopero generale contro la manovra, la protesta in tutta Italia. E il messaggio molto chiaro è che non solo la piazza non si precetta ma che non s ... author: Arman Shirinyan
title: Bitcoin (BTC) Breaks $70,000: $80,000 Next? XRP Secures Crucial Support Level, Solana (SOL) Paints Strong Reversal Pattern
text: [www.freepik.com](https://www.freepik.com/premium-ai-image/stack-gold-coins-table_146079677.htm#position=4) Disclaimer: The opinions expressed by our writers are their own and do not represent the views of U.Today. The financial and market information provided on U.Today is intended for informational purposes only. U.Today is not liable for any financial losses incurred while trading cryptocurrencies. Conduct your own research by contacting financial experts before making any investment decisions. We believe that all content is accurate as of the date of publication, but certain offers mentioned may no longer be available. [Bitcoin](https://u.today/mysterious-whale-unloads-322-million-in-bitcoin-on-major-us-exchange) has recently surpassed the $70,000 mark, showing the potential to reach $80,000. The chart reveals a strong performance with the price consistently maintaining above the 50-day moving average, which currently rests around $65,000. The price is comfortably above the 200-day moving average, located near $48,000, which serves as a long-term indicator of support. [Bitcoin](https://u.today/real-reasons-why-bitcoin-broke-70000) has touched and momentarily sustained levels above $70,000, which is indicative of a growing and improving market position. The Relative Strength Index (RSI) is placed around 60, which suggests that there is room for upward movement without the asset being overbought. The first resistance for the digital gold is near the $76,000 level, which could potentially limit upward movements if not surpassed with substantial buying momentum. A well-defined support zone near $60,000 should offer a safety net against any short-term pullbacks. The current positioning of Bitcoin, slightly above $70,000, is critical, as it is indicative of the [market's](https://u.today/ethereums-eth-4000-is-new-goal-shiba-inu-shib-to-explode-in-symmetrical-triangle-cardano-ada-on) bullish sentiment. If the momentum continues and buying pressure remains consistent, the possibility of Bitcoin reaching or even exceeding the $80,000 threshold appears within the realm of possibility. Solana makes comeback [Solana](https://u.today/solana-sol-about-to-explode-hidden-metric-tells-a-lot) is on a bullish, or positive, trend, according to its chart. The chart shows that after a price drop, a strong recovery took place, sending SOL above $170 again. This is usually a good sign and means the trend might reverse from falling to ascending. The price is now higher than some key levels that traders look at, suggesting it could continue going upwards. SOL is above numerous moving averages, signaling a potential continuation of the bullish rally. Being above the 50-day average is a good sign for the short term performance of SOL, and being above the 200-day average is a good sign for the long term movement of the asset. The amount of SOL being traded, or the volume, helps us understand if the trend is strong. For now, volume profiles show a descending tendency, signaling a potential weakness in the current trend. For [SOL](https://u.today/solana-sol-about-to-explode-hidden-metric-tells-a-lot), the RSI is going up, which usually suggests the growth of buying power. However, values too high would most likely lead to a reversal due to the limited room for potential price growth. Overall, the SOL chart looks good. Prices are climbing and the important signs we are looking at are positive. If SOL keeps above the key levels, its price could rise even more. Tracking key indicators like volume and RSI could be go-to strategies right now. Any dips in price might be a chance to buy, but at the same time, a fall below crucial support levels will most likely lead to a prolonged reversal. XRP gains some ground XRP has finally solidified a crucial support level. It has sustained above the significant price level of $0.60, which has been the main battleground for bears and bulls for the last few weeks. As for potential growth scenarios, the chart shows the possibility of a steady climb if the current support levels hold up. If buyers keep control over the chart, near the $0.65 mark — a peak that has thwarted previous rallies — may once again come into play. A break beyond this threshold could signal a march toward higher levels, with eyes set on the $0.70 horizon. Conversely, should the winds shift and XRP's price falter below the $0.50 support, it could signal a retreat to lower depths, testing the resolve of holders and the strength of the market's sentiment. XRP's future looks cautiously optimistic, but as always, you should stay cautious, considering the coin's performance in the past. Monitoring moving averages, RSI and volume could be a good idea when considering opening position in XRP, especially if your risk tolerance is not high.

author: NA
title: Football: Canadian coach, analyst kicked out of Games after drone incident | The Star
text:
PARIS: Canada coach Bev Priestman removed herself from their opening match duties at the Paris Olympics while an assistant coach and a team analyst were kicked out of the Games after a spying scandal engulfed the women’s football tournament.
Global football’s governing body FIFA said they had begun disciplinary proceedings after New Zealand’s women’s team said their training session on Monday had been disrupted by a drone flown by a staff member of their opening Group A opponents Canada.
The Canadian Olympic Committee (COC) said on Wednesday they had taken action to remove two members of staff from their Olympic squad, who were gold medallists at the Tokyo Games, while Priestman would not take charge against New Zealand.
“Joseph Lombardi, an unaccredited analyst with Canada Soccer, is being removed from the Canadian Olympic Team and will be sent home immediately,” COC said in a statement.
“Jasmine Mander, an assistant coach to whom Mr Lombardi reports to, is being removed from the Canadian Olympic Team and will be sent home immediately.”
Lombardi was handed an eight-month suspended jail term and his material was confiscated, a French court said.
FIFA said on Wednesday they had “opened proceedings against Canada Soccer, Ms Beverly Priestman, Mr Joseph Lombardi and Ms Jasmine Mander due to the potential breach of article 13 of the FIFA Disciplinary Code and article 6.1 of the Regulations Olympic Football”.
“The matter will be submitted for the consideration of the Disciplinary Committee in the next days,” FIFA explained in a statement.
Priestman apologised for what had happened and said ultimate responsibility lay with her.
“On behalf of our entire team, I first and foremost want to apologise to the players and staff at New Zealand Football and to the players on Team Canada,” she said.
“This does not represent the values that our team stands for. I am ultimately responsible for conduct in our programme.
“Accordingly, to emphasise our team’s commitment to integrity, I have decided to voluntarily withdraw from coaching the match. In the spirit of accountability, I do this with the interests of both teams in mind and to ensure everyone feels that the sportsmanship of this game is upheld.”
The incident was reported by the NZOC to the police and to the International Olympic Committee’s integrity unit. — Reuters

author: 星島日報加拿大多倫多
title: 失業5個月搵工搵到灰 37歲翻譯碩士呻爆：碩士呢個包袱太重 網民搵到癥結點出呢條生路｜Juicy叮
text:
失業5個月搵工搵到灰 37歲翻譯碩士呻爆：碩士呢個包袱太重 網民搵到癥結點出呢條生路｜Juicy叮
本港最新失業率升至3.5%。一名37歲失業5個月的翻譯碩士，近日因為搵工搵到灰而在網上自爆其職業生涯，並呻爆「碩士呢個包袱太重」。細心又熱心的網民卻根據履歷，找到這位失業碩士的問題癥結，紛紛伸援手點出一條生路。詳情見下圖及下文：
失業5個月搵工搵到灰 37歲翻譯碩士呻爆：碩士呢個包袱太重 逐張睇↓↓↓↓
樓主翻譯碩士畢業 失業5個月
樓主今日（26日）凌晨在社交平台Threads以「搵工搵到灰」為題發帖，指：
「本人今年37（歲），翻譯碩士畢業，失業5個月，不斷搵，一直得個in（interview，面試）字，好笑嘅係早排收到offer（錄取通知），過兩日間公司打嚟話因為cut budget（削減預算）而唔請（更好笑嘅係同類事件2019年都遇過一次），而家真係灰到不行。
我知衰，做嘢12年，好多行都做過，翻譯、copywriting（撰稿）、marketing（市場擴廣）、物業管理、飲食、零售、CS（customer service，客戶服務），無份工做得長，最長嗰份年零，唔過probation（試用期）嘅4、5份，而家CV（curriculum vitae，履歷）都係老吹自己一直freelance（自由職業）。適應力低，multitasking（多任務處理）差，中招之後記性都差埋。另一個認衰位係嫌辛苦，雖然鍾意煮嘢食，但飲食真係太辛苦，講到尾碩士呢個包袱都係太重。
我要求唔高，都係搵入行門檻低嘅工，CS、物業管理，fresh grad welcome（歡迎應屆畢業生）嗰啲照apply（申請），開fresh grad價。自問語文好，大專教書同補習都有試。copywriting都有apply，但而家興AI（人功智能），所以唔想再寫字。無專業資格，讀言語治療碩士要50個（50萬元），而且讀完都四張（40歲），太遲啦，其他短course（課程）（例如ERB（Employees Retraining Board，僱員再培訓局）嗰啲）讀完出嚟人工又好低，呢個年紀同學歷要捱實在太難。無晒方向，亦唔係做老細嘅材料，到底我應該點做？」。
相關閱讀：樹仁仔失業半年轉做清潔輕鬆袋14K 怕太留戀「舒適區」
有網民看過樓主的長文後，分析出問題癥結所在：
•份份工做唔長都幾致命；
•呢個世界無懷才不遇，根本就係心態問題，先諗下點解有4、5份唔過probation；
•你呢種態度應該係仲未搵到自己想做乜嘢工，你應該問自己最想做乜好過求其搵一份；
•我想問，有咩工係唔辛苦，能力差係藉口，話自己呢樣唔得嗰樣唔掂，知衰無用，係要去面對，份份工做唔過兩年，幾次唔過 probation，通常唔係能力嘅問題，係工作態度嘅問題。
相關閱讀：月入6萬中年IT男失業 一家之主愁坐食山崩 網民心酸集氣指點生路
網民發長文回應鼓勵樓主
另有網民指，「你語言好其實好羨慕，你打鬼佬工就比我呢啲講句英文都麻麻地嘅人優勝萬倍」，不過也人不太認同這優點，指「語言好，唔代表溝通好，成長背景影喺人際溝通、文化不同就會有代溝」。
有網民認為「這是好一篇令人警惕的文章，多謝sharing（分享）；不少人更是熱心地把耳聞目睹，甚至發長文與樓主分享自身經歷，把事情一碼一碼地鋪開說過明白以鼓勵樓主：
•十幾年前，電台有個聽眾講自己經歷，講自己係博士生。都一直搵唔到工。然後退而求其次用中學學歷搵到份文職，之後老細有份文件要佢搞，搞好咗老細一睇，文件裏嘅雞腸（英文），唔係中學生可以寫得出嘅水平，一叫人入房傾先知佢有博士學歷，然後升佢做經理，師兄，睇你肯唔肯搏一鋪。
•master（碩士）都唔代表乜，以前公司請過一個雙master做admin位，全公司最入門嗰個位仲要12k（$12000）佢都殺，總公司HR（人事部）仲話我哋發啦！我哋心諗咁嘅學歷咁嘅職級佢都殺？……嘩做落就知，佢完全係只係識讀書嗰啲人嚟，教極唔曉，個腦好似日日都係新嘅一樣。血都嘔出嚟。結果試用期要延長，之後過唔到，炒埋。擺低你心中張證書，好好諗下自己可以點增值自己⋯⋯
•我啱啱諗返起之前fresh grad（剛畢業）都係無自信，撞正疫情難搵工，甚至in完聽返熟人講我唔啱，有些少明樓主點解會覺得所有可能性都無嘅窒息感覺。希望你可以振作，我早前都經歷咗一段唔愉快嘅工作經歷，睇埋心理，而家我有返自信，有新工返。試下吸引力法則，心態決定境界！樓主可以利用呢段時間學下新嘢，識多啲人，識人好過識字。
•你本身能力唔得，咪搵啲唔使multitasking嘅簡單工作囉。雖然有AI，但freelance譯嘢都仲存在，只求有嘢做的話，用個學歷搵下補習都會有。我都係翻譯碩士 對我嚟講只係用錢買嘅一個學歷嚟咋喎，無乜特別，亦從來無用呢個學位嚟搵工。唔知你bachelor（學士學位）係讀咩，但建議唔好focus（專注）自己學歷先，諗下點樣改進個人溝通同工作能力罷啦，你乜都嫌，唔會有咩好結果，不如直接退休算。
•問自己鍾意靠技能搵食定係做office（寫字樓）（先唔好考慮自己學歷、以前工作經驗、屋企人看法，自己意願number 1（第一））。唔好話無所謂， 因為係兩條好唔同嘅路。我有位中學同學以前中學會考（舊日嘅DSE，中學文憑試），做咗幾年炒散， 跟住入咗地鐵做物業管理助理，要夜晚拿支電筒周圍巡嗰個級別。佢一邊讀夜校， 一張張Cert（證書）、Diploma（文憑）、Degree（學位），專業資格全部讀曬返來。埋單係總監級（已退休）。幸苦一定幸苦，但係中老年生活好好多，又有嘢可以自豪。
•首先，市道係差，僧多粥少，就算有得面試，10個人可能最終請1個，意味住有9個人會失敗，有時可能10個都唔啱。其次，碩士學歷好普遍，而且要相關／有牌先有用，我就唔熟翻譯行業，但似乎碩士唔係太大幫助，而且有AI真係唔多需要請咁多翻譯，更加少機會請個新人返嚟，有工開都未必收入好。我諗你要放開碩士呢個頭銜，諗下自己想行咩路，讀完言語治療40歲要50個（50萬元）唔係好大問題，有成廿年比你實搵得返，關鍵係你適唔適合，讀完唔做浪費咗時間同50萬先係真正問題。加埋香港地需要勞工，嫌辛苦係好棘手，人地唔嫌棄，你都嫌份工辛苦唔想做。37歲可能仲有廿幾年做嘢，諗清楚自己條路，用幾年時間儲知識同經驗，都仲有起碼廿年比你搵錢，有啲更加65歲都可以繼續做。放低身段係難，但經濟條件差，比你美斯（球王美斯，Lionel Messi）咁叻喺香港都係無咩前途。你有咁嘅學歷，相信都有咁上下認知能力可以做到判斷。加油，係唔容易，37歲諗掂，好過10年後47歲仲煩緊呢樣嘢。
•我同你一樣37（歲），搵工大概搵咗幾個月，都係得個in字，不過我同你相反就係只係做過兩份工，我因為好loyalty（忠誠），所以從未俾人challenge jumpy（質疑轉工頻密），但可能有人又會覺得我唔上進，真係好睇interviewer（面試官）點睇。我覺得問題未必完全喺你身上，而係個大環境真係差，其他人都有講依家job opening（職位空缺）真係少，有時見自己都match（符合） JD（Job Description職位敘述） 80-90%，傾落各方面vibe（氛圍）都好，但就無下文，轉頭見佢又repost（再招聘），我都懷疑好多公司未必真請人，就算真係請都要搵個120% match晒各樣條件嘅人，搵唔到寧願唔請，所以點解我試過見有啲位話懸空咗半年至1年。你依家經濟壓力會唔會好大？如果大我覺得可以做住pt（part time，兼職）再搵ft（full time全職），我依家都係做住pt+freelance搵ft，我就好在自己一支公，生活壓力唔太大，同埋有嘢做住搵工會令自己分散注意力，唔會成日loop（循環）住灰。You are not alone（你不孤單），我好明白你未搵到工嗢種灰，我自己都一樣有懷疑自己係咪真係咁差？但諗返好多同我做過嘢嘅人都對我正評，你唔請我係你損失；我早排因為灰所以暫停搵工一星期，最近沉澱完又重新出發，加油，機會總有一天會出現！
相關閱讀：老婆唔知老公失業兩個月？ 靠舊同事通水驚悉真相 網民明白男人最痛
網民替樓主逃選職業路向
接著，有不少網民認真地替樓主逃選職業路向，建議：
•旅遊顧問，導遊；
•去國內二線城市教英文；
•最穩陣就一早應該去教小學同中學；
•你做私人補習得唔得呀？ 都係一條出路嚟嘅；
•做補習社，或多外國人機構/學校做Admin（行政）；
•物管其實啱你，壓力唔大，寫中英文信你又掂，又唔使multitasking，穩穩陣陣；
•創業，做顧問，拍youtube（網上短片分享平台）講下行內秘聞，好搵；一路煮飯一路講，又係一條出路；
•思前想後，我覺得你應該搵保安去做。放底你嘅學歷包袱，去搵一份適合自己性格嘅工作，咁先係對自己最好；
•試下考政府contract（合約） EA（ executive assistant，行政助理）位。語文好，幫到手。不過都要改善下做事的程序，如果唔係好難做文職；
•我覺得你可以嘗試搵下法庭會請嘅翻譯員或者相關法庭書記、文員嗰啲，我諗你嘅學歷都幾符合，薪水都高同穩定，工作壓力我唔太清楚，但話曬都法律相關所以唔可以hea住做啦。
本港失業率升至3.5%
政府統計處6月17日公布，本港今年3月至5月經季節性調整的失業率為3.5%，較2月至4月微升0.1%；就業不足率也升0.1%至1.4%。期內總就業人數為3,664,700人，較2月至4月減約12,400人；總勞動人口為3,800,500人，較2月至4月減約6,000人。
資料來源：lamlamlam2606＠Threads
相關閱讀：減薪4位數字轉新工 中年打工仔一原因勁感恩 同路人：少5日大假都肯做↓↓↓↓
打工仔為兩餐，人工當然越高越好，但有人卻竟然反其道而行，願意減薪4位數字轉新工；有相似境況的同路人更加自爆，減薪轉工後連大假也少了5天。不過，這兩位打工仔竟不約而同地因為一原因而樂在其中↓↓↓↓
>>>星島網WhatsApp爆料熱線
(437)4289394，爆料一經錄用，薄酬致意。
>>>立即瀏覽【
移民百答】欄目：新移民抵埗攻略，老華僑也未必知道的事，移民、工作、居住、食玩買、交通、報稅、銀行、福利、生育、教育。

author: Milthon Puch
title: "En México es tiempo de mujeres", responde Claudia Sheibaum a pregunta de reportera de Grecia | El Heraldo de México
text: [Claudia Sheinbaum Pardo](https://heraldodemexico.com.mx/nacional/2024/7/11/lazaro-cardenas-batel-atenderemos-las-prioridades-que-claudia-sheinbaum-nos-indique-620059.html), virtual presidenta electa de México, fue cuestionada esta mañana por una reportera de Grecia acerca de lo que para ella representa el haberse convertido en la primera mandataria en gobernar México, a lo que respondió que es un símbolo para todo el continente. Sigue leyendo: [Lázaro Cárdenas será el Jefe de la Oficina de la Presidencia de Claudia Sheinbaum](https://heraldodemexico.com.mx/nacional/2024/7/11/lazaro-cardenas-sera-el-jefe-de-la-oficina-de-la-presidencia-de-claudia-sheinbaum-620018.html) [Rosa Icela Rodríguez se reúne con Clara Luz Flores, se comprometen a trabajar mano a mano](https://heraldodemexico.com.mx/edicion-impresa/2024/7/11/rosa-icela-rodriguez-se-reune-con-clara-luz-flores-se-comprometen-trabajar-mano-mano-620119.html) Así lo expresó la exjefa de Gobierno de la Ciudad de México durante la conferencia de prensa que ofreció esta mañana en la casa de transición, en donde informó que el próximo Jefe de la Oficina de la Presidencia de la República será [Lázaro Cárdenas Batel](https://heraldodemexico.com.mx/nacional/2024/7/11/quien-es-lazaro-cardenas-batel-proximo-jefe-de-oficina-de-la-presidencia-de-la-republica-con-claudia-sheinbaum-620038.html), hijo del excandidato presidencial Lázaro Cárdenas y nieto del expresidente de México, Lázaro Cárdenas del Río. "Es un gran privilegio, decimos que en México es tiempo de mujeres": Sheinbaum Esta mañana, una reportera del Newspapper de Atenas cuestionó en inglés a Claudia Sheinbaum sobre lo que significa para ella ser una mujer presidenta: "¿Qué significa ser una mujer presidenta para México, para Latinoamérica, para Europa y para todo el mundo? Creo que es algo importante", cuestionó la reportera. Instante en el que Sheinbaum respondió que es un gran privilegio, "decimos que en México es tiempo de mujeres": "Es un símbolo para nuestro continente el ser una mujer que llega a la Presidencia de México. Es un símbolo para todo el mundo que en un país como México -que durante 200 años de República no había tenido una mujer como presidenta, por primera vez en 200 años vayamos a tener una mujer presidenta", externó [Claudia Sheinbaum](https://heraldodemexico.com.mx/nacional/2024/7/10/claudia-sheinbaum-recibe-clara-brugada-en-su-casa-de-transicion-619748.html). "Yo he dicho que no llego sola", continuó; "todas las mujeres mexicanas llegamos juntas. Y como presidenta no solo tengo que ser una mujer en la Presidencia, sino también lograr la agenda de las mujeres en México: en contra de la violencia y por nuestros derechos", concluyó la virtual presidenta electa de México.

author: @tvbiobio
title: A todo Jazz: Milena Sax
text:
Ética y transparencia de BioBioChile
En esta nueva entrega de A Todo Jazz, recibimos la visita de la saxofonista Milena Araya, quien tomó el nombre artístico de Milena Sax como el sello de un sonido y del instrumento con que se ha desenvuelto en la música popular, desde sus inicios como integrante de la Conchalí Big Band. Su música se ha vinculado al pop, al soul, al funk y al reggae.
Recuerda que puedes seguirnos en IG @atodo_jazz y en Youtube como @ATodoJazzChile y Spotify como A Todo Jazz.

Su música se ha vinculado al pop, al soul, al funk y al reggae.
Recuerda que puedes seguirnos en IG @atodo_jazz y en Youtube como @ATodoJazzChile y Spotify como A Todo Jazz.

author: Blavity
title: Tony Blanco And Octavio Dotel, Former MLB Players, Among 113 Dead After Dominican Republic Nightclub After Roof Collapse - Blavity | Flipboard
text:
Tony Blanco And Octavio Dotel, Former MLB Players, Among 113 Dead After Dominican Republic Nightclub After Roof Collapse - Blavity The death toll continues to rise after the roof of a popular Dominican Republic nightclub collapsed early Tuesday morning, authorities said. According …
